fields.Title: APT / MAZOV BUST
fields.Description: This is the bust of Kras Mazov. Finishes "Find out if you're Kras Mazov" task.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Kim, you have to admit, this Kras..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, you have to admit, this Kras Mazov bears a striking resemblance to me."

fields.Title: You: "Who is Kras Mazov?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who is Kras Mazov?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's known as the father of scient..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's known as the father of scientific communism, also known as Mazovianism. His theories about economic history greatly influenced -- some would even say *sparked* -- the Antecentennial Revolution."

fields.Title: You: ""Because *actually* he wanted stabi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because *actually* he wanted stability and incremental progress -- and so do I."

fields.Title: You: ""That's right." (Nod.) "Filthy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right." (Nod.) "Filthy."

fields.Title: Bust of Kras Mazov: "Seems like a good guy judging by th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like a good guy judging by the moustache. By the way... doesn't he kind of look like *you*?

fields.Title: You: ""I have to consider and investigate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have to consider and investigate all possibilities."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), was an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), was an economist and theoretical historian. He was a leading figure on the Graad side of the Turn-of-the-Century Revolution, where he headed the Eleven Day Government. Mazov is considered the father of scientific communism (Mazovian thought or Mazovianism).

fields.Title: Bust of Kras Mazov: "Situated between a poster of a whit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Situated between a poster of a white star and a photo of revolutionaries posing with their guns... This can't be a coincidence. There can be only one explanation.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for sharing this wonderf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for sharing this wonderful opinion on human sexuality." He pretends to read the economics book open on the table.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure it is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure it is."

fields.Title: You: ""Whoever lives here needs to learn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoever lives here needs to learn how the economy *actually* works." (Stare at the bust.)

fields.Title: You: ""Kras Mazov was a filthy homo-sexua..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kras Mazov was a filthy homo-sexual." (Stare at the bust.)

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah -- I have a problem. A proble..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- I have a problem. A problem with alcohol."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think you have misunderstood who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think you have misunderstood who he was, but..." the lieutenant sighs. "If you say so."

fields.Title: Bust of Kras Mazov: "A plaster cast bust depicts a middl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A plaster cast bust depicts a middle-aged man with impressive sideburns. The name on the plinth reads 'Kras Mazov'.

fields.Title: You: ""Father Mazov, the hero of the work..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Father Mazov, the hero of the working class!" (Salute the statue.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"] == true  and  IsTHCPresent("communist")  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
You: ""Maybe this bust shows him *before*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe this bust shows him *before* he started drinking."

fields.Title: Jump to: [mainhub no kim]
Bust of Kras Mazov: "Kras Mazov is a *communard*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kras Mazov is a *communard*.

fields.Title: You: ""I hate deviants.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hate deviants."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: "He opens his eyes again, tilting hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He opens his eyes again, tilting his head in a quiet wonder. "Why are you so hell-bent on proving that you're Kras Mazov anyway?"

fields.Title: You: ""Because I believe a powerful natio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I believe a powerful nation-state is the only way to protect the working class from subhumans."

fields.Title: mainhub no kim
Bust of Kras Mazov: "The bust doesn't reply. The hallway..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bust doesn't reply. The hallway behind the door is empty; no one heard your words.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There aren't many communists aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There aren't many communists around -- not after the Revolution. Some youths still keep the ideology going, it seems."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Honestly, he does kind of look like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honestly, he does kind of look like you after all.

fields.Title: Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
You: ""Kras Mazov was a sexual deviant. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kras Mazov was a sexual deviant. A zoophile probably."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"] == true  and  IsTHCPresent("revacholian_nationhood")  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Yes, Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), was an economist and theoretical historian. He was a leading figure on the Graad side of the Turn-of-the-Century Revolution, where he headed the Eleven Day Government. Mazov is considered the father of scientific communism (Mazovian thought or Mazovianism).

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suspect that's exactly what they..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suspect that's exactly what they're trying to do." He leans closer to inspect the economics book on the table.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.garte_said_maybe_youre_kras_mazov"]
Variable["whirling.garte_said_maybe_youre_kras_mazov"]
!(Variable["whirling.garte_said_maybe_youre_kras_mazov"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except that Kras Mazov is dead. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Except that Kras Mazov is dead. He's been dead for 50 years now."

fields.Title: You: ""Just humour me for a moment... Don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just humour me for a moment... Don't you see the resemblance?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright. But here's the big thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright. But here's the big thing -- Kras Mazov looks Samaran, and you don't."

fields.Title: mazov_finale
You: ""Because I'm a communard.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because I'm a communard."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then it's settled," says the lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then it's settled," says the lieutenant, straightening his back. "You're not Kras Mazov."

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's not settled -- I might st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's not settled -- I might still be Kras Mazov. It's just a birthmark."

fields.Title: You: ""No, he doesn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, he doesn't."

fields.Title: You: ""I might not look like him, but I k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I might not look like him, but I know it in my heart -- Kras Mazov, that's me."

fields.Title: You: ""Because he was totally a gangster..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because he was totally a gangster and a bank robber who went for *all* the cash in the world. That's *me*."

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, who is this Kras Mazov?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, who is this Kras Mazov?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [mainhub no kim]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, you both do seem to share an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, you both do seem to share an affinity for sideburns. But it seems like old Kras here didn't drink nearly as much as you."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, I'm really not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, I'm really not."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, *Kras*. You fought in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, *Kras*. You fought in the Revolution and everything," the lieutenant notes. "If you say so."

fields.Title: You: ""Kras Mazov was a mass murderer. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kras Mazov was a mass murderer. There's nothing *cool* about keeping his bust on your night stand." (Stare at the bust.)

fields.Title: Bust of Kras Mazov: "A *poor* communard, from the looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A *poor* communard, from the looks of it. The room is barely bigger than a closet.

Variable["tc.mazov"]
!(Variable["tc.mazov"])
Variable["apt.communist_room_star_poster_orb"] == true  and  Variable["apt.communist_room_revolutionaries_orb_clicked"] == true
Variable["apt.communist_room_star_poster_orb"] == true  and  Variable["apt.communist_room_revolutionaries_orb_clicked"] == true
!(Variable["apt.communist_room_star_poster_orb"] == true  and  Variable["apt.communist_room_revolutionaries_orb_clicked"] == true)
You: ""I can't tell -- I can't see my fac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't tell -- I can't see my face."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant closes his eyes. "Ok..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant closes his eyes. "Okay, you win. Be Kras Mazov then, I don't care..."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He was definitely controversial. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was definitely controversial. The tenant here seems to like him..." He leans closer to inspect the photos of revolutionaries on the wall.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure you are.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure you are."

fields.Title: You: ""I definitely don't have a birthmar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I definitely don't have a birthmark on my left cheek."

IsKimHere()

You: ""Whoever lives here needs to learn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoever lives here needs to learn how the economy *actually* works."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"] == true  and  IsTHCPresent("ultraliberal")  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
Untitled hub (02)
Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hold on a second... Is this why yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on a second... Is this why you broke in here? To find out whether you're Kras Mazov?"

fields.Title: You: ""How do you know? The bust is proba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you know? The bust is probably just a romanticized depiction anyway."

fields.Title: You: ""A communard lives in this room." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A communard lives in this room." (Look around.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts a finger on a pale dot embe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He puts a finger on a pale dot embellishing the bust's cheekbone. "Doesn't he have a birthmark right here? What about you?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You do -- but that's not the point..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You do -- but that's not the point. The point is, he doesn't look like you."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not saying that I *am* Kras Ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not saying that I *am* Kras Mazov, I'm just saying that we look alike."

fields.Title: Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
Jump to: [mainhub no kim]
mazov bust mainhub
You: ""Kras Mazov was a mass murderer. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kras Mazov was a mass murderer. There's nothing *cool* about keeping his bust on your night stand."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"] == true  and  IsTHCPresent("moralist")  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: You: ""Father Mazov, the hero of the work..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Father Mazov, the hero of the working class!" (Salute the statue.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises a brow."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant raises a brow.

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's purely coincidental.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's purely coincidental."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The white star... the photos on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The white star... the photos on the wall... I think we have broken into the apartment of a young communard." He looks around, before mumbling to himself: "How fitting."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Bust of Kras Mazov: "A warm feeling fills you as you loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A warm feeling fills you as you look into Mazov's marble eyes. The hallway behind the door is empty; no one else heard your courageous salute.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Whoever lives here definitely shar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoever lives here definitely shares your enthusiasm." He leans closer to inspect the photos of revolutionaries on the wall.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, this is silly -- I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, this is silly -- I'm no Kras Mazov."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even bother..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't even bother to reply to this.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very well." The lieutenant leans c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very well." The lieutenant leans closer to the sculpture. "Let's look for identifying features then..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, he does. Look at his eyes. Wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, he does. Look at his eyes. Wasn't his mother a Samaran immigrant?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, that's something we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, that's something we definitely don't have in common."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's decided -- you're *not* the m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's decided -- you're *not* the most famous philosopher of the modern period." The lieutenant nods, turning away to inspect the photo on the other wall.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, *Kras*," the lieutenant n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, *Kras*," the lieutenant notes. "If you say so."

fields.Title: You: ""Why does this tenant have a bust o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why does this tenant have a bust of Kras Mazov in their bedroom?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good, so you're not him.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good, so you're not him."

fields.Title: Jump to: [mazov bust mainhub]
You: ""I'm part Samaran myself.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm part Samaran myself."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure, it's just a feeling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure, it's just a feeling I have. But I trust my feelings."
